net.co.java.model

Class AbstractModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.co.java.model.AbstractModel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Model
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Mock, PostgreSQL

    public abstract class AbstractModel
extends java.lang.Object
implements Model
    The AbstractModelis an abstract Model providing caching for the identities of players, items and item prototypes.
    Author:
    Jan-Willem Gmelig Meyling, Thomas Gmelig Meyling
